S04bsu008_u:1_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahānadīnairañjanātīre sanniṣaṇṇaḥ sārdhamāryāvalokiteśvara
S04bsu008_u:1_1: bhagavān bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalamālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇo dharmapratisaṃyuktayā kathayā etān santoṣayati sañcodayati samuttejayati saṃharṣayati /
S04bsu008_u:1_2: maṇḍalamālāyāstathāgato maharddhinagarīṃ vārāṇasīṃ gatvā tasyāmāmrapālīvane niṣīdati sma /
S04bsu008_u:1_3: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivī saṅkampitā sampravedhitā /
S04bsu008_u:1_4_0: sthitaṃ tatra mahāsiṃhāsanamekaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ saptakarmakṛtaṃ yojanamātramuccamardhayojanamātravistṛtaṃ
S04bsu008_u:2_0: atha bhagavān siṃhāsanasthito buddhāvataṃsakanāma samādhiṃ pratileme /
S04bsu008_u:2_2_0: avalokiteśvara tvaṃ mahālokadhātuṃ gatvā ca daśasu dikṣu lokadhātau vineyasattvānāṃ
S04bsu008_u:2_2_1: kaṣāyayuktānām aśrāddhānāṃ pāpacaritānāṃ kleśāvṛtānām amātṛjñānāmapitṛjñānām aśrāmaṇyānām
S04bsu008_u:2_2_2: abrāhmaṇyānāṃ triratnānabhiśrāddhānāṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ ca vajrapāṇiśca dvau maharddhiṃ
S04bsu008_u:2_2_3: samādhibalaṃ pratipadya asyāṃ maṇḍalamālāyāmabhisaṅkṣipya saṅgrahaṃ kurutam /
S04bsu008_u:3_0: athāryāvalokiteśvaro vajrapāṇiśca tathāgatasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvasattvānavalokya samuttejanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede /
S04bsu008_u:3_1: tena samādhibalena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitā prakampitā samprakampitā /
S04bsu008_u:3_2: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau brahmalokadhātau yāvad rūpalokadhātau tayoḥ kāyāvabhāsaprādurbhāvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu008_u:3_3: atha tadavabhāsata imāḥ sañcodanā gāthā niścaranti sma /
S04bsu008_u:4_0: atha tadā kāyāvabhāsaniścaritagāthāvasāne ekaikaṃ pāramparyeṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarve sattvā vijñāpitāḥ samuttejivāḥ /
S04bsu008_u:4_1: te sarve sattvā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ parityajya samyagadṛṣṭiyuktā abhūvan /
S04bsu008_u:4_3: ye kāmarāgānucaritāḥ pramattāste prāṇātipātādattādānakāmeṣu mithyācārādyaṣṭākuśaladharmebhyo nivṛttāḥ āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge sthāpitāḥ /
S04bsu008_u:4_6: atha sarve te yena mahānagaryayāṃ vārāṇasyām āmrapālīvanaṃ tenopasaṅkramya tathāgatānāmavaropitakuśalamūlapuṇyatejasā tathāgatasyopari puṣpavargamabhiprāvarṣan /
S04bsu008_u:5_0: atha tadā bhagavān jambudvīpe āmrapālīvanaṃ samantataḥ niyutaśatasahasrayojanavistīrṇamadhyatiṣṭhat [BuBal_177.
S04bsu008_u:5_1: 18] samaṃ pāṇitalamiva ca divyaṃ manoramaṃ varṇopetam /
S04bsu008_u:6_0: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiśca samādhervyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu008_u:6_4_0: sādhu sādhu kulaputrāḥ / evameva bahavo bho jinaputrāstathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyaṃ
S04bsu008_u:6_5_0: kecit sattvā bodhisattvavaineyāḥ kecicchrāvakavaineyāḥ kecit pratyekabuddhavaineyāḥ
S04bsu008_u:6_5_1: kecid devavaineyāḥ kecit śakravaineyāḥ kecid brahmavaineyāḥ kecinnāgavaineyāḥ kecinmahardhikavaineyāḥ
S04bsu008_u:6_5_2: kecidrājavaineyāḥ kecit samādhivaineyāḥ kecid dharmaśravaṇavaineyāḥ kecit prātihāryavaineyāḥ
S04bsu008_u:6_7: dharmāṇāmapi ca bho jinaputrā nāsti tathāgatānāṃ kiñcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā /
S04bsu008_u:6_8: āgataṃ vā jānāti / anāgataṃ vā jānāti / alpaṃ vā jānāti / bahuṃ vā jānāti / atītaṃ jānāti / pratyutpannaṃ jānāti / sarvasattvānāmīryāpathaṃ jānāti /
S04bsu008_u:6_9_0: cariṃ jānāti / dhātuṃ jānāti / utpādaṃ jānāti / upapattiṃ jānāti / tadyathā bho jinaputrā
S04bsu008_u:6_10: balaṃ jānāti / velaṃ jānāti / auṣadhaṃ jānāti / vātikaṃ paittikaṃ ślaiṣmikaṃ sānnipātikaṃ
S04bsu008_u:6_11: rudhiram āmajaṃ gulmikaṃ jalodaraṃ hṛdarogaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kaṇḍūṃ dadruṃ piṭakādīn viṣavaisarpādīn jānāti /
S04bsu008_u:6_12_0: sa sarvaṃ jñātvā nānāvidhāni dravyauṣadhāni prayojya vamanavirecanacūrṇayoganastukarmasīrābandhanadhṛtatailabālacūrṇayogena
S04bsu008_u:6_18: tadyathāpi kulaputrāḥ candramaṇḍalamupāyākauśalya samanvāgataṃ yathādhātukuśalamūlavaineyān sattvānāmarthāya ātmānamantarhitaṃ darśayati /
S04bsu008_u:6_24: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ nānāduḥkhāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātuvaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ mārgacaryākauśalyaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati /
S04bsu008_u:7_0: atha tasmin samaye keṣāñcidalpabuddhīnāṃ devaputrāṇām etadabhavat /
S04bsu008_u:7_1: kimayaṃ tathāgataḥ kṣiprameva parinirvāṇadhātau praveṣṭumicchatīti te cintayitvā durmanasaḥ abhūvan /
S04bsu008_u:7_4_2: tathāyamanena tathāgatena sarve tathāgatakṛtyaṃ nādyāpi kṛtam /
S04bsu008_u:7_5: tasmāt śokavyatikramaṇaṃ saṃvarṇayatīti cintayitvā te tūṣṇīmabhūvan /
S04bsu008_u:8_0: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtasteṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cittamājñāya tān devaputrānetadavocat /
S04bsu008_u:8_1: devaputrā mā evaṃ cintayata mā pravyāharata /
S04bsu008_u:8_2: mā dinamanaso bhavata / bahūnitathāgatānāmupāyakuśalanānopāyaprajñāsamādhyādikuśalamūlabalapraṇidhānāni nānāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu008_u:8_3: yathā mayā devaputrāḥ tathāgatānāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatopāyakauśalyam ṛddhivikurvāṇaprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāhaṃ jānāmi /
S04bsu008_u:8_4: mā hi eva tathāgato buddhabalādhānaprātihāryaṃ nāma mahāsūtrarājaṃ prakāśayitukāmo 'tireka kartukāmaḥ /
S04bsu008_u:8_5: api ca devaputrā na tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti /
S04bsu008_u:8_7: na āyuḥkṣayo bhavati / [BuBal_182] aprameyakalpakoṭīm anabhilāpyākalpāstathāgatāḥ tiṣṭhanti /
S04bsu008_u:9_0: api ca upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayanti /
S04bsu008_u:9_3_0: yathā yathā sattvān paśyati parinirvāṇavaineyaḥ dhātuvaineyaḥ kaṣāyikajātīyaḥ tathāgate
S04bsu008_u:9_3_1: aśraddadhānatām aguruśuśrūṣitāṃ gacchati tathā tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇaṃ darśayati
S04bsu008_u:9_6: candramaṇḍalaṃ yathā rocate tathā tadā tathāgatā loka utpadyante bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya /
S04bsu008_u:9_7: yāvaddevānāṃ ca munuṣyāṇāṃ ca triratnoddayotanāya sphuṭanāya na ca tathāgatānāṃ jātiḥ saṃvidyate /
S04bsu008_u:9_8_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ ādarśamaṇḍale sumṛṣṭe nānā rūpāṇi dṛśyante dṛśyaṃ na
S04bsu008_u:9_8_1: saṃvidyate na tatrāgamo dṛśyate na nirgamaḥ pratibimbasya evameva devaputrāḥ tathāgatakāyo
S04bsu008_u:9_9_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputrā māyakāraḥsuśikṣitaḥ nānānagaratoraṇodyānāṃ nānārathāṃ
S04bsu008_u:9_9_1: cakravartirūpāṃ nānāratikrīḍāṃ darśayitvā antardhāpayati na ca tasyāḥ krāntirdṛśyate
S04bsu008_u:9_9_2: na āgamo na nirgamaḥ evameva tathāgatānāmutapādaparinirvāṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu008_u:9_10_0: api ca devaputrāḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā api kalpaparinirvṛtā api
S04bsu008_u:9_11: kaḥ punarvādo ye tathāgatān pratyakṣapūjayā pūjayiṣyanti gandhapuṣpamālyavilepanavastrābharaṇaiḥ /
S04bsu008_u:9_12_0: ye ca devaputrāḥ kecit sattvā varṣaśatasahasrakalpakoṭīparinirvṛtān prāñjalibhūtān
S04bsu008_u:9_12_1: ekavārān nāmadheyaṃ grahīṣyanti 'namo buddhāyeti ' kṛtvā puṣpamākāśe kṣepasyanti
S04bsu008_u:9_13_0: tiṣṭhatvākāśe puṣpaṃ ye kecit sattvāḥ anuśikṣamāṇāstathāgatapūjārthāya ekatathāgataśikṣāmapi
S04bsu008_u:9_15_0: ...vāpi hāsyalāsyabālaratikrīḍanakameva kārayiṣyanti sarve te duḥkhasyāntaṃ kṛtvānuttarāṃ
S04bsu008_u:9_15_1: samyaksambodhimabhisambodhiṣyanti kaḥ punarvādo ye dhātustūpaṃ dhātupratimāṃ vā kṛtvā
